channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Jerk chicken burger
item.description:
Jerk chicken burger



Flavour lean chicken with Jamaican-inspired spicy seasoning, griddle then and serve in a bread roll with mango, tomato, lettuce and sauce.

item.title: Southwestern pasta salad
item.description:
Southwestern pasta salad



This zesty Southwestern Pasta Salad features all the best and boldest fixings. Bacon, jalape√±os, black beans, corn, and more are dressed in a creamy chipotle ranch dressing that will have your whole party lining up for second helpings..

item.title: Portobello mushrooms with brioche and a poached egg
item.description:
Portobello mushrooms with brioche and a poached egg



As with all dishes which involve eggs and toast and getting ready in the morning, this is all about timing. Ideally, you want the mushrooms and toast coming out of the oven at about the same time, to both be warm, and the eggs poached and ready soon after. Get the mushrooms cooking first, put the bread into the oven halfway through, and then get the eggs poaching. This works as well as a starter late in the day as it does in the morning. Use duck eggs for an extra-rich twist..

item.title: Cheat's sausage cassoulet
item.description:
Cheat's sausage cassoulet



Step-by-step method for making Cheat's sausage cassoulet yourself..

item.title: Spicy pies with sweet potato mash
item.description:
Spicy pies with sweet potato mash



This pie is loosely based on the flavours of an American sloppy joe, but we've topped it with mash as an alternative to the traditional cottage pie.
